text: Vladimir Vasilev Ivanov (, 23 April 1955 â€“ 26 November 2020) was a Bulgarian sprinter. He was born in Sofia. He competed in 400 metres at the 1980 European Indoor Championships. At the 1980 Olympics he finished sixth. Ivanov died from COVID-19-related problems in Sofia, Bulgaria on 26 November 2020, aged 65. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Bulgaria Category:Sprinters Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bulgaria
title: Vladimir Ivanov (athlete)
